### Learning Outcomes

Through this course students will:

1. Learn basic logical concepts and principles of good reasoning.

2. Understand logical form and truth functional logic.

3. Learn techniques for translating sentences into logical notion and determining the validity of arguments.

4. Learn truth tables and other means of determining the validity of arguments stated in sentential logical notation.
